column4: I installed a program (numpty physics) from a deb file and I cant uninstall it, sudo aptitude remove -f numptyphysics doesnt work
please don't act like that.  Stay family-friendly if you wish to remain here
I'm not sure what kind of help you expect from "doesn't work".  It probably gives you some output which you should share.  No one "flamed" you.  We asked for more details
